content.text:
# Timelines of modern history

The following are timelines of modern history, from the end of the Middle Ages, , to the present.
Overview
Europe
ImageSize = width:900 height:600
PlotArea = width:720 height:550 left:80 bottom:20
AlignBars = justify
Colors =
id:time value:rgb(0.7,0.7,1) #
id:period value:rgb(1,0.7,0.5) #
id:age value:rgb(0.95,0.85,0.5) #
id:era value:rgb(1,0.85,0.5) #
id:eon value:rgb(1,0.85,0.7) #
id:filler value:gray(0.8) # background bar
id:black value:black
Period     = from:1450 till:1850
TimeAxis   = orientation:horizontal
ScaleMajor = unit:year increment:100 start:1450
ScaleMinor = unit:year increment:10 start:1450
PlotData =
align:center textcolor:black fontsize:8 mark:(line,black) width:20 shift:(0,-5)
bar:Timeframe color:era
from:1500 till:1800 text:Early modern period
bar:Timeframe color:filler
from:1450 till:1500 text:Late Middle Ages
from:1800 till:1850 text: Late modern period
bar:General color:age
from: 1450 till: 1700 shift:(-120,3) text:Renaissance
from: 1450 till: 1750 shift:(-150,-8) text:Age of Discovery
from: 1517 till: 1650 shift:(0,3) text:Reformation
from: 1545 till: 1650 shift:(0,-8) text:Counter-Reformation
from: 1543 till: 1687 shift:(100,-5) text:Scientific Revolution
from: 1687 till: 1804 shift:(0,4) text:Age of Enlightenment
bar:General color:filler
from: 1765 till: 1850 shift:(0,-8) text:Age of Revolution
from: 1760 till: 1850 shift:(0,4) text:Industrial Revolution
bar:Portugal color:age
from: 1491 till: 1683 text:Early globalization
from: 1683 till: 1808 text:Portuguese Enlightenment
bar:Portugal color:filler

from: 1814 till: 1820 text:

from: 1820 till: 1850 text:Liberalism

from: 1492 till: 1850 shift:(0,3) text:Spanish Empire
from: 1492 till: 1700 text:Spanish Renaissance
from: 1700 till: 1807 text:Spanish Enlightenment
bar:Spain color:filler
from: 1450 till: 1492 text:Reconquista
from: 1807 till: 1814 text:P.W
from: 1814 till: 1850 text:Nationalism

from: 1801 till: 1850 shift:(0,4) text:Industrial Revolution
from: 1801 till: 1850 shift:(0,-8) text:United Kingdom
bar:France color:age

from: 1610 till: 1789 text:Ancien Régime
from: 1453 till: 1789 shift:(0,4) text:Early Modern France

from: 1789 till: 1792 shift:(0,4) text:French Revolution
from: 1789 till: 1850 shift:(9,-8) text:Late Modern France
bar:Scandinavia  color:age
from: 1523 till: 1814 shift:(0,3) text:Denmark–Norway
from: 1523 till: 1814 shift:(0,-8) text:Sweden

from: 1450 till: 1523 text:Kalmar Union

bar:Germany color:age

from: 1648 till: 1815 text:Kleinstaaterei

from: 1450 till: 1495 text:Pre-I.R
from: 1806 till: 1815 shift:(0,4) text:Rhine Confederation

bar:Italy color:age

from: 1494 till: 1559 text:Italian Wars

bar:Italy color:filler
from: 1450 till: 1494 text:Medieval Italy

bar:Poland color:age
from: 1507 till: 1569 text:Polish Golden Age

bar:Poland color:filler

bar:Russia color:age

:::  Early modern themes   Other themes
General timelines
Early modern period
*For a timeline of events prior to 1501, see
*For a timeline of events from 1501 to 1600, see
*For a timeline of events from 1601 to 1700, see Timeline of the 17th century
*For a timeline of events from 1701 to 1800, see Timeline of the 18th century
Late modern period
*For a timeline of events from 1801 to 1900, see Timeline of the 19th century
*For a timeline of events from 1901 to 1945, see Timeline of the 20th century
** For 1914–1918, see Timeline of World War I
** For 1939–1945 see Timeline of World War II
Contemporary period
*For a timeline of events from 1945 to 2000, see
** Timeline of the Cold War
*For a timeline of events from 2001 onward, see Timeline of the 21st century
Future
* Timelines of the future

Further reading
